website_summaries.verdict: Quality, realistic-looking flame candle perfect for setting moods inside and outdoors.
pros: Simple, versatile, value flame light bulb that fits in most indoor and outdoor sockets

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: We love the light! Looks very realistic. The first bulb stopped working after one day. I contacted the seller and he sent a replacement right away. We received it within a couple days. New bulb is working great!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Nice ambient lighting
customer_reviews.text: Used in the carriage lights on my home at the front door. Have received many compliments from n neighbors. Light appears as a flickering orange flame like from a gas lamp. First set last about 1 year, lit EVERY night from dusk to dawn.
customer_reviews.author: MrsMarTay

customer_reviews.title: Looks Like the Real Thing
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased and happy with my purchase. They are exactly what I ordered and came in on time. After placing them into my two front lanterns I have gotten many replies where did I get those bulbs that look like they are on fire. Very realistic looking flame
customer_reviews.author: Thomv

customer_reviews.title: Happy Happy
customer_reviews.text: Love these lights. They really make a statement on the front of my house. I like being different & these lights help. Very good quality bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Should be on recall
customer_reviews.text: This flame bulb is exactly that. It almost went up in flames. This is a poorly made product that should not be sold. It almost caught fire. There are two wires inside on ours that started melting together. If I had not noticed it's change in lighting function it probably would have done far worse than just flicker oddly.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: As seen on tv Flame dud
customer_reviews.text: No flame effect just a flicker orangish color. Better alternatives out there.
customer_reviews.author: John Bess

customer_reviews.title: NOT realistic at all :(
customer_reviews.text: We found Bell+Howell's Flame Bulb to be very unrealistic. It flashes much too rapidly, and is more of an annoyance than anything. Returning the two we bought...
customer_reviews.author: M. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Seizure in the making!
customer_reviews.text: So bright & flashed so fast the neighbors called the police! Not looking like a flame, more like a strobe light! They could use these on construction barrels. Don't waste your money unless you want to annoy your neighbors!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie A. Moorman

customer_reviews.title: short life
customer_reviews.text: Did not last very long, about 3 months, moisture got in it and it shorted out.
customer_reviews.author: R. S.

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied! We use them each Christmas!
customer_reviews.text: We have them on our garage lights and forgot to get one for the porch light. We really enjoy the old world look under our Christmas lights around our house. I am now ordering the one I forgot to order!
customer_reviews.author: Advisor_Al

product_meta.title: Bell + Howell Flame Bulb Realistic Flame-Effect Flickering LED Light Bulb As Seen on TV
product_meta.description:
Bell + Howell's Flame Bulb is the most realistic candle flame-effect flickering light bulb!

You'll have the most relaxing candle-lit evening without the worry of catching fire.
Just enjoy the warmth and comfort feeling you get when you surround yourself with flickering candles. 
Simply put it on your lampshade in the bedroom, lampstands in the living room, or on the torch lamps in your pathway. 
It can even set the mood for a romantic candle-lit dinner with your loved-one!
feature_bullets: Great Alternative to Dangerous Real Candles - You can now enjoy the candle glow and ambience in your home without all the hassles of buried and stuck on wicks, messy candle wax, or getting blown out by the wind over and over again!
Realistic Candle Flame Flickering Effect - You will love the fast-flickering technology that mimics the comforting and relaxing flame-effect of a real candle.
No Fire Hazzard - You will never have to worry about the risk of candles catching on fire. Sleep safe and sound.
Best for Garden, Pathway, or Candle-Lit Dining - Not only for indoor use, it's safe for outdoor fixtures too! Perfect for lighting your patio, garden, or pathway!
No Special Installation - It fits anywhere and on any light bulb fixtures that you already have at home!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars15 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
